EmailTemplate.description: Start using our in-store VOI service
EmailTemplate.name: Start using our in-store VOI service
EmailTemplate.subject: Start using our in-store VOI service
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
Thanks for returning your signed VOI (Property Transfers) Referral Agreement. Now you and your clients can use our in-store verification of identity (VOI) service at participating Post Offices.
Generate your forms You have a choice of two VOI forms that are quick and easy to complete:
Reusable VOI form (version V5.10) – Pre-populated with your company name and unique barcode, this form can be printed as needed for clients to complete manually. Client-specific VOI form (version V5.10) – Also pre-populated with your company name and barcode, this form allows you to prefill individual clients' details.
Access the online form generators via the Property VOI portal at https://auspost.com.au/propertyvoi
Access VOI reports You can access reports via the Property VOI portal. You'll find instructions on how to use the report repository here.
Questions? Email us at LandTitleVOI@auspost.com.au or call us on 1300 364 543.
Kind regards,
Australia Post Property VOI Team
